name: In the bush
description:
In the bush

is a casual rougelike where you play as a fly who needs to clear the stage from other insects to proceed to the next stage. At the start of each stage you get to select a mod that makes you stronger.

Mods

Mods aid you on your journey to finish the game.
Over 20 different mods are available and more are to come. 
Combine different mods for different builds and destroy your enemies.

Enemies

There are currently 18 different enemies and 3 bosses to battle.
